text: Rita Karen Olsen Beck (born January 31, 1933)Tiquicia.org - Spanish is a Danish-American-Costa Rican politician and social worker. She was the First Lady of Costa Rica during the governments of her husband Jos√© Figueres Ferrer 1954 to 1958 and 1970 to 1974. She was a Legislative Assemblywoman and the Ambassador of Costa Rica to Israel.Women leaders, guide, accessed January 2011 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1933 births Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Costa Rica Category:Costa Rican politicians Category:Ambassadors to Israel Category:Politicians from Copenhagen Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from New York (state)
